headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  STOLLMACK, FREDRIC R

snippet: STOLLMACK--Fredric R. Founder and president of Weatherproof Garment Company. Adored father and grandfather. Survived by beloved son Bruce, daughter-in-law Laura, cherished grandchildren Natasha, Rachel, Jackson, and sister Sasha. Forever our patriarch. 1/3
lead_paragraph: STOLLMACK--Fredric R. Founder and president of Weatherproof Garment Company. Adored father and grandfather. Survived by beloved son Bruce, daughter-in-law Laura, cherished grandchildren Natasha, Rachel, Jackson, and sister Sasha. Forever our patriarch. 1/3
